Title: We Be Ballin'
Writer: Blake Anderson (creator), Blake Anderson, Adam DeVine (creator), Adam DeVine, Brian Keith Etheridge, Kevin Etten, Anders Holm (creator), Anders Holm, David King (staff writer), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Kyle Newacheck, Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam DeVine, Anders Holm, Erik Griffin
Plot: The guys go to extremes to try and get tickets to a sold out basketball game to impress a girl.
